site.name: ORI 369
site.tagline: Your Bridge Between Science and Energy
site.description: At ORI 369, we combine cutting-edge therapeutic approaches, the latest technologies, and a deep understanding of 3-6-9 frequencies to help you achieve balance of body, mind, and spirit.
site.address: Ulica škofa Maksimilijana Držečnika 11, 2000 Maribor, Slovenia

therapies.name: Electrostimulation
therapies.shortDescription: Electrostimulation activates muscle tissue, improves blood circulation, and relieves pain.
therapies.fullDescription: Electrostimulation therapy is a type of physical therapy that uses electrical current and impulses to reduce pain, accelerate cellular metabolism, and speed up healing.

therapies.name: Manual Therapy
therapies.shortDescription: With gentle manual techniques, the therapist releases tension and improves mobility.
therapies.fullDescription: Manual therapy gets its name from the word manus=hand, indicating the use of the therapist's hands as the main treatment tool. It is one of the most popular forms of treatment.

therapies.name: Tecar Therapy
therapies.fullDescription: Advanced therapy that uses radiofrequency energy to accelerate tissue regeneration, relieve pain, and improve circulation and cellular metabolism.

therapies.name: Magnetic Therapy
therapies.shortDescription: Use of magnetic fields for body stimulation and regeneration.
therapies.fullDescription: Use of magnetic fields to stimulate the body, improve blood circulation, and promote regeneration. Helps with injury healing and chronic pain.

therapies.name: MIS (Magnetic Induction Stimulation)
therapies.fullDescription: Magnetic Induction Stimulation (MIS) is a revolutionary therapy that provides exceptional results through an innovative approach.

therapies.name: Laser Therapy
therapies.shortDescription: Non-invasive method using laser light beams.
therapies.fullDescription: Laser therapy is a non-invasive treatment method that uses laser light beams to stimulate human tissue to accelerate healing.

therapies.name: Medical Taping
therapies.shortDescription: Method using elastic tapes to eliminate pain and swelling.
therapies.fullDescription: Medical taping is a treatment method that applies self-adhesive elastic tapes to the skin to eliminate pain, swelling, and other injury symptoms.

therapies.name: Cupping Therapy
therapies.shortDescription: Cupping therapy for healing and regeneration.
therapies.fullDescription: Cupping therapy is a manual technique that uses small cups to accelerate healing, regeneration, and pain relief.

therapies.name: Dry Needling
therapies.shortDescription: Invasive physiotherapy method using dry needling.
therapies.fullDescription: Dry needling is an invasive physiotherapy method that penetrates thin needles through the skin to stimulate tissue and trigger the healing process.

therapies.name: Iteracare
therapies.fullDescription: Iteracare is an advanced therapeutic method for regeneration and healing.

therapies.name: AO Scan
therapies.fullDescription: AO Scan enables a complete organism review and identification of energy imbalances.

therapies.name: Traction Table
therapies.fullDescription: The traction table enables gentle stretching and spinal decompression.

therapies.name: Scalar Waves (Chakras)
therapies.fullDescription: Scalar waves help balance energy centers - chakras.

therapies.name: Guided Breathing
therapies.fullDescription: Individual guided breathing for relaxation and breathing optimization.

packages.name: Awaken the Body
packages.description: 3x Electrostimulation, 3x Tecar therapy, 3x Iteracare and massage, 3x Manual - Storm therapy, 1x Final treatment

packages.name: Body Awareness
packages.description: 6x Electrostimulation, 6x Iteracare and massage, 6x Laser, 6x Tecar therapy, 6x Manual - Storm therapy, 1x Final treatment

packages.name: Universe
packages.description: 9x Electrostimulation, 9x Tecar therapy and massage, 9x Traction table, 9x Manual - Storm therapy, 9x MIS Magnetic induction stimulation, 9x Scalar waves - chakra balancing, 3x AO Scan, 1x Moti-physio Scan

packages.name: Activation
packages.description: MIS, guided breathing, vibrations, scalar waves, ice treatments. Focus: cellular activation, hormonal optimization, musculoskeletal system improvement

packages.name: Balance
packages.description: Vibrations, MIS, iteracare, drum, chakra balancing. Focus: mental and physical stability, nervous system relaxation, hormonal balance

testimonials.name: Ana M.
testimonials.text: Therapies at ORI 369 helped me with chronic pain. Now I feel energetic and healthy!

testimonials.name: Marko K.
testimonials.text: Professional approach and exceptional results. I recommend it to everyone seeking holistic support.

testimonials.name: Petra S.
testimonials.text: The Balance package helped me find inner harmony. The team is exceptional!
